div.p: In the thirteenth [year] of Imperator [Caesar] Titus Aelius Hadrianus Antoninus [Augustus] Pius, he has performed the dike [work for the] same 13th year from Mesore 21 to 25 on [the â€¦ ] shipping canal, for Soknopaiou Nesos: [NN,] son of Panephremmis, grandson of [Pausiris (?),] whose mother is Tanephremmis. I, Dioskoros, have signed.
